fast3d.complex

Class GroupOperator

  • java.lang.Object
    • fast3d.complex.GroupOperator

  • public abstract class GroupOperator
extends java.lang.Object
    if some triangles are hold by more than one group it might be necessary to calculate which is in both, only in one, only in the other and so on, to not remove or add one multiple times to or from a universe or remove a triangle not if it is hold by another group in the universe
    Author:
    Tim Trense

      GroupOperator()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Group intersection(Group a, Group b)
      returns every triangle that is in a and b
      static Group subtract(Group minuend, Group subtrahend)
      returns every triangle that is in minuend but not in subtrahend
      static Group symmDifference(Group a, Group b)
      returns every triangle that is nor in a or b
      static Group union(Group a, Group b)
      returns every triangle that is in a or b, but every triangle only once

        subtrahend - the second set of triangles
        Returns:
        a minus b

      • union

        public static Group union(Group a,
                          Group b)
        returns every triangle that is in a or b, but every triangle only once
        Parameters:
        a - the first set of triangles
        b - the second set of triangles
        Returns:
        a union b
